p: Out of the 30 studies reporting spatiotemporal and risk factor modelling of FMD, 20 were designed as retrospective studies using mostly historical data and were often associated with survey results based on questionnaires [ 36– 39, 41– 56]. Among this type of selected studies, 4 were designed as case-control [ 49– 52], 4 others were conducted as cross-sectional or seroprevalence studies [ 57– 60] and 2 modelling studies were performed based only on questionnaires data [ 61, 62]. A table is provided in the appendix ( Part A of S3 Table ), to summarise the key features of the different FMD modelling techniques used in studies included in this systematic review.
